goal.en: Students will learn how to use verilog and the operation of FPGA.
goal.ch: "訓練學生熟悉硬體描述語言的使用, 以及可程式邏輯閘列的使用與操作"

content.en:
Introduction
1. Introduction to HDL-based design methodology
2. Language fundamentals -- Verilog HDL
3. Introduction to synthesis
Combinational Logic
4. Modeling combinational logic circuits
5. LED and seven-segment display
Sequential Logic
6. Modeling synchronous logic circuits
7. 4x4 Keypad and push button sensing
Finite State Machine
8. Modeling finite state machines
9. LCD panel display
Digital System
10. Modeling digital systems
11. Final project
content.ch:
"課程概述：本課程在教導學生了解數位系統的基本概念, 以及組合邏輯與循序邏輯的設計原理並利用硬體描述語言設計數位系統。
課程目標：訓練學生熟悉硬體描述語言的使用, 以及可程式邏輯閘列的使用與操作
實驗時段有二,請參照課程系統說明, 務必擇一時段
Introduction
1. Introduction to HDL-based design methodology
2. Language fundamentals -- Verilog HDL
3. Introduction to synthesis
Combinational Logic
4. Modeling combinational logic circuits
5. LED and seven-segment display
Sequential Logic
6. Modeling synchronous logic circuits
7. 4x4 Keypad and push button sensing
Finite State Machine
8. Modeling finite state machines
9. LCD panel display
Digital System
10. Modeling digital systems
11. Final project"

textbook.en:
"1. Joseph Cavanagh, “Verilog HDL- Digital Design and Modeling,” CRC Press
2. Samir Palnitkar, “Verilog HDL – A Guide to Digital Design and Synthesis”, SunSoft Press."

2. Samir Palnitkar, “Verilog HDL – A Guide to Digital Design and Synthesis”, SunSoft Press."
